alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 1:37AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Narrow line of heavier snow showers will impact portions of Mitchell, southwestern Jewell, eastern Smith, eastern Franklin and southwestern Webster Counties through 215 AM CST... At 133 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a narrow line of modersate to briefly heavy snow showers along a line extending from Upland to near Inavale to 6 miles northwest of Cawker City. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Brief bursts of moderate to heavy snow along a narrow line. SOURCE...Radar and webcam indicated. IMPACT...Plan on quick reductions in visibility along with slippery road conditions. Locations impacted include... Beloit, Cawker City, Glen Elder, Lebanon, Upland, Esbon, Riverton, Ionia, Victor, Bellaire and Inavale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with these snow showers.
